_description: Three monorhyming lines on the Sufferings of Christ

BLHar7322.Transcription: Hou þi fairnisse is bispitHou þi swetnisse is ibetin and ipitHou þi lotleschipe to scharp detȝ is of set
BLHar7322.Note: Added to lower margin of leaf in pale ink or plummet.
